#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    unsigned long long tcases, count=0;
    double a, b, c, len, diagonal;
    
    cin >>tcases;
    cin >>a >>b >>c;
    diagonal=sqrt((a*a) + (b*b) + (c*c));
    
    while (tcases--)
    {
        cin >>len;
        if (len<=diagonal)
         count++;
    }
    cout <<count <<endl;
    return 0;
}
